column4: I want to install gdm but when I use apt-get it also wants to install 2 alsa packages.  Is there a way to install gdm without the dependencies?
I want to install gdm but when I use apt-get it also wants to install 2 alsa packages.  Is there a way to install gdm without the dependencies?
we heard you the first time.  why would you want to do that?
because I don't need the alsa packages
